titles.title: Commending the Florida Everblades hockey team for winning the 2022 East Coast Hockey League's Patrick J. Kelly Cup.
Commending the Florida Everblades hockey team for winning the 2022 East Coast Hockey League's Patrick J. Kelly Cup.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution commends the Florida Everblades hockey team for winning the 2022 Patrick J. Kelly Cup.
